decision_conditions:
Condition : 1 - The works to which this consent relates, must be begun not later than the expiration of three years beginning with the date of this consent.
Reason: To accord with the provisions of Section 18(1) of the Planning (Listed Buildings and Conservation areas) Act 1990.

Condition : 2 - The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans and specifications: [Unnumbered Location Plan, AM_2408_PL101, AM_2408_PL102, AM_2408_PL104, AM_2408_PL105, AM_2408_PL106, AM_2408_PL107, AM_2408_PL108, AM_2408_PL109, AM_2408_PL110, AM_2408_PL111, AM_2408_PL112, AM_2408_PL301_3.2, AM_2408_PL302_3.2, AM_2408_PL304_3.2, AM_2408_PL305_3.2, AM_2408_PL306_3.2, AM_2408_PL307_3.2, AM_2408_PL308_3.2, AM_2408_PL309_3.2, AM_2408_PL310_3.2, AM_2408_PL311_3.2, AM_2408_PL312_3.2, AM_2408_PL351_3.2, AM_2408_PL352_3.2, AM_2408_PL354_3.2, AM_2408_PL355_3.2, AM_2408_PL356_3.2, AM_2408_PL357_3.2, AM_2408_PL358_3.2, AM_2408_PL359_3.2, AM_2408_PL360_3.2, AM_2408_PL361_3.2, AM_2408_PL362_3.2, AM_2408_PL371_3.2, AM_2408_PL372_3.2, AM_2408_PL374_3.2, AM_2408_PL375_3.2, AM_2408_PL376_3.2, AM_2408_PL377_3.2, AM_2408_PL378_3.2, AM_2408_PL379_3.2, AM_2408_PL380_3.2, AM_2408_PL381_3.2, AM_2408_PL382_3.2, Design and Access Statement & Photographs, Planning Statement, Heritage Impact Assessment, Fire Safety Statement and Flood Risk Assessment. Received: 05/08/2024].
Reason: In order to ensure the development is carried out in accordance with the planning permission.

Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the development hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building, unless otherwise shown on the approved plans.
Reason: In order to safeguard the appearance of the area.
description: Listed building consent for the erection of a first floor extension to the northern elevation and a single storey side infill extension following demolition of the existing conservatory, a part first floor side extension, creation of a courtyard with gate, relocation of a door and window on the west elevation and associated internal alterations
